Uses of Class
sage.scene.Material

  • Packages that use Material 
    Package Description
    sage.model.loader  
    sage.scene  

    • Uses of Material in sage.model.loader

      Subclasses of Material in sage.model.loader 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OBJMaterial
      This class encapsulates the material information defined by one OBJ 'newmtl' command and provides accessors to obtain each of the values defined for the material.

    • Uses of Material in sage.scene

      Methods in sage.scene that return types with arguments of type Material 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Material> TriMesh.getFaceMaterials()
      getFaceMaterials returns the ArrayList holding the Materials associated with the faces (triangles) of this TriMesh.
      Method parameters in sage.scene with type arguments of type Material 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TriMesh.setFaceMaterials(java.util.ArrayList<Material> faceMaterials)
      setFaceMaterials sets the array of face materials in this TriMesh to the specified array of Materials.
